templates.template: content ${name} chrome/content/ skin ${name} classic/1.0 chrome/skin/classic/ overlay chrome://browser/content/browser.xul chrome://${name}/content/overlay.xul locale ${name} ${locale} locale/${locale}/

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?xml-stylesheet href="chrome://global/skin/global.css" type="text/css"?>
<?xml-stylesheet href="chrome://${name}/skin/overlay.css" type="text/css"?>
<!DOCTYPE overlay SYSTEM "chrome://${name}/locale/overlay.dtd">

<overlay id="${name}-overlay" xmlns="http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul">
  <script type="application/x-javascript;version=${javascriptvar}" src="chrome://${name}/content/overlay.js" />

  <stringbundleset id="stringbundleset">
    <stringbundle id="context-strings" src="chrome://${name}/locale/overlay.properties"/>
  </stringbundleset>

  ${context}
  ${menu}
  ${sidebar}
  ${toolbarbutton}
  ${toolbar}

</overlay>
<popup id="contentAreaContextMenu"> <menuitem id="${name}-context" label="&${name}.context.label;" accesskey="${name}.context.accesskey;" insertafter="context-stop" oncommand=""/> </popup>

<menupopup id="viewSidebarMenu"> <menuitem key="key_openSidebar_all" observes="viewSidebar_all" /> </menupopup>
<keyset id="mainKeyset"> <key id="key_openSidebar_${name}" command="viewSidebar_${name}" /> </keyset>
<broadcasterset id="mainBroadcasterSet"> <broadcaster id="viewSidebar_${name}" label="&${name}.sidebar.label;" autoCheck="false" type="checkbox" group="sidebar" sidebarurl="chrome://${name}/content/sidebar.xul" sidebartitle="&${name}.sidebar.label;" oncommand="toggleSidebar('viewSidebar_${name}');" /> </broadcasterset>

<?xml version="1.0"?> <?xml-stylesheet href="chrome://global/skin/" type"text/css" ?> <!DOCTYPE page SYSTEM "chrome://${name}/locale/overlay.dtd">
<page id="${name}Sidebar" title="&${name}.sidebar.label;" xmlns="http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul"> <script src="sidebar.js"/>
<vbox flex="1"> <label value="&${name}.sidebar.label;" /> </vbox> </page>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?xml-stylesheet href="chrome://global/skin/" type="text/css"?> <!DOCTYPE prefwindow SYSTEM "chrome://${name}/locale/options.dtd"> <prefwindow id="${name}-preferences" xmlns="http://www.mozilla.org/keymaster/gatekeeper/there.is.only.xul" title="&${name}.prefwindow.title;"> <prefpane id="pane1" label="&${name}.pane1.title;"> <preferences> <preference id="boolpref1" name="extensions.${name}.boolpref" type="bool"/> <preference id="intpref1" name="extensions.${name}.intpref" type="int"/> <preference id="stringpref1" name="extensions.${name}.stringpref" type="string"/> </preferences> <checkbox id="checkboolpref" preference="boolpref1" label="&${name}.checkboolpref.label;" accesskey="&${name}.checkboolpref.accesskey;"/> <label accesskey="&${name}.intpref.accesskey;" control="textintpref">&${name}.intpref.label;</label><textbox id="textintpref" preference="intpref1"/> <label accesskey="&${name}.stringpref.accesskey;" control="textstringpref">&${name}.stringpref.label;</label><textbox id="textstringpref" preference="stringpref1"/> </prefpane> </prefwindow>
